mapper.insert: INSERT INTO class ( class_name, email, category_number, detail, price, max_member, location_number, start_date, end_date ) VALUES ( #{class_name}, #{email}, #{category_number}, #{detail}, #{price}, #{max_member}, #{location_number}, #{start_date}, #{end_date} )
INSERT INTO hashtag ( class_number, hashtag_name, category_number ) VALUES ( (SELECT MAX(class_number) FROM class), #{hashtag_name}, #{category_number} )
INSERT INTO image ( original_name, save_name, path, size, main_image ) VALUES ( #{original_name}, #{save_name}, #{path}, #{size}, #{main_image} )
mapper.select: SELECT c.class_number class_number , c.class_name class_name , c.detail detail , c.price price , c.max_member max_member , c.current_member current_member , c.start_date start_date , c.end_date end_date , c.view_number view_number , c.writing_date writing_date , IFNULL(l.class_like,0) class_like , m.email email , m.nickname nickname , m.introduce introduce , m.path member_img_path FROM class c LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT class_number, COUNT(like_state=1) class_like FROM `like` GROUP BY class_number) l ON c.class_number = l.class_number LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT m.email email, m.nickname nickname, m.introduce introduce, i.path path FROM member m LEFT OUTER JOIN image i ON m.email = i.email) m ON c.email = m.email WHERE c.class_number = #{class_number}
